function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Conflicting priorities between science-based strategies and economic or political demands","Impact":"Ineffective crisis response, further spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Education on the importance of scientific consensus, collaboration between different sectors","Technologies":"N/A","People":"General population, public health agencies, policymakers","Owner":"Public health agencies, policymakers, educational institutions"},{"Description":"Conflicting messages from authorities on responsible behaviors during crises","Impact":"Inconsistent public response, failure to contain contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Clear and consistent communication from authorities, public education campaigns","Technologies":"Communication technologies, public health messaging platforms","People":"General population, authorities, public health agencies","Owner":"Authorities, public health agencies, communication experts"},{"Description":"Disproportionate impact of climate crisis and COVID-19 on vulnerable populations","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to contagious diseases, social and economic inequality","Mitigation":"Targeted support for vulnerable populations, policy reform addressing inequality","Technologies":"Healthcare technologies, data analytics for vulnerable populations","People":"Vulnerable populations, policymakers, healthcare providers","Owner":"Policymakers, healthcare providers, social welfare organizations"}]}
